content: संपातः {@--1@} Falling together, concurrence {@--2@} Meeting together, encountering. {@--3@} Collision, butting against. {@--4@} Falling down, descending; <ls>Bg. 1. 20.</ls> {@--5@} Alighting (as of a bird). {@--6@} Flight (of an arrow). {@--7@} Going, moving. {@--8@} Being removed, removal; <ls>Ms. 6. 56.</ls> {@--9@} A particular mode of the flight of birds; <ls>Pt. 2. 54</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> डीन. {@--10@} The residue (of an offering). {@--11@} <ab>N.</ab> of the son of Garuḍa.
